<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Avenge in Glory](/Feats.aspx?ID=964) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 20 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Access**
mountain dwarf ethnicity

**Trigger**
An ally within 30 feet gains the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition.

</column>

---

You honor your ally’s life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.
name: Avenge in Glory
